GateDocument.TextWithNodes:
Welcome to the 2nd annual Lab-on-a-Chip World Congress, designed to review existing and new life science applications of microfluidic technologies.
This year's event is to be held in Barcelona, the dynamic capital city of Catalonia.
The conference will be co-located with the Advances in Microarray Technology and Advances in Biodefense Technology conferences. Registered delegates will also have access to these meetings ensuring a very cost-effective trip. Distinguished Faculty:Jon Cooper (сhair in Bioelectronics Research Centre, University of Glasgow) Andreas Manz (Head of Institute for Analytical Sciences, Dortmund and Berlin) Call for Posters Deadline: 24 March 2008 You can also present your research on a poster while attending the meeting. Submit an abstract for consideration now! Sponsorship and Exhibition Opportunities paul.raggett@ selectbiosciences.com +44 (0) 1787 315117 http://www.selectbiosciences.com/…es/LOAC2008/
